dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset consisting of real anonymous questions from the Bing search engine and approximately 8.8 million candidate passages for passage reranking task. The training set contains about 500 thousand positive query-passage pairs, with the development set and evaluation set containing 6980 queries and 6837 queries respectively, where the relevance labels are provided for the development set only.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO Passage Ranking

dcterms:creator: Ellen M Voorhees
dcterms:description: A newswire collection used by TREC 2004 Robust track, which comprises 250 queries and 0.5 million documents.
dcterms:title: TREC Robust 2004
